title: Brendan Fraser
summary: Brendan James Fraser (/ˈfreɪzər/ FRAY-zər;[1][2] born December 3, 1968[3]) is an American actor of Canadian descent.[4][5] He played Rick O'Connell in The Mummy trilogy (1999–2008), and had leading roles in numerous comedy and fantasy films, including Airheads (1994), Dudley Do-Right (1999), Monkeybone (2001), Inkheart (2008), and Furry Vengeance (2010). Fraser branched into dramatic cinema with roles in The Passion of Darkly Noon (1995), Mrs. Winterbourne (1996), Journey to the End of the Night (2006), and Gimme Shelter (2013). During a hiatus from film acting, Fraser found success in television, with supporting roles in the History miniseries Texas Rising (2015), the Showtime drama series The Affair (2016–2017),[6][7] the FX anthology series Trust (2018)[8] and the DC Universe / HBO Max action series Doom Patrol (2019–present).[9]
